title: Old life, new life

description: For Raelanah Loloa, moving from the town where she grew up in New Zealand to start a new life in Australia was an experience both exciting and stressful. It was hard leaving all her friends and trying to make new ones but, eventually, Raelanah and her family were able to build a new life in Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001927; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; To be Catalogued; 2009
